LanguageData.LightsOut_Settings_EverythingButLightsOu: Turn off lights in empty rooms
If you turn this off, this mod becomes \"LightsOn\". On by default.
LanguageData.LightsOut_Settings_NightLightsLabel: Keep the lights on when your pawns go to bed
LanguageData.LightsOut_Settings_NightLightsTooltip: Enable this if your pawns are scared of the dark. Off by default.
LanguageData.LightsOut_Settings_LatentPowerDrawRateTo: Percentage of normal power (or other resource) to draw when in standby. 0% by default (0-100%).
LanguageData.LightsOut_Settings_ActivePowerDrawRateTo: Percentage of normal power (or other resource) to draw when in use. 100% by default (100+%).
LanguageData.LightsOut_Settings_DebugMessagesTooltip: If enabled extra debug messages will be logged. Keep this off unless you're debugging this mod.
LanguageData.LightsOut_Settings_DebugMessageFilterToo: A space-delimited list of debug message keys that should log.
LanguageData.LightsOut_Gizmos_KeepOnTooltip: Prevent pawns from turning this light off.
LanguageData.LightsOut_Settings_AnimalPartyTooltip: Allows animals to activate/deactivate lights as they move around rooms
LanguageData.LightsOut_Settings_DelaySecondsLabel: Seconds to wait before turning off lights
LanguageData.LightsOut_Settings_DelaySecondsTooltip: The number of seconds between a pawn wanting to turn off a light and the light actually turning off. Useful to stop lights from flickering in high-traffic areas.
